issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
In the Chrome app (and iOS webViews) it's possible to get a contectMenu and download files (images in this case) after  a long press. This contextMenu isn't available for webViews on Android. 

It would be nice to get this contextMenu in webView and download images (or maybe video's too?).
fields.summary: Android: support for downloading images in webViews

comments.body: Hello, Thanks for the request, Our engineers will look into it.
